website_summaries.verdict: Lazy Susan-style dispenser with many compartments to keep a variety of candies or other snacks handy.
pros: Can hold a lot of different kinds of snacks and candy
Some compartments large enough for chip bags
cons: Unless you have many items to store, you might find it too bulky

customer_reviews.title: Arrived Broken
customer_reviews.text: It's a piece of junk. The first one arrived with a broken part that connects the top to the bottom rack. They sent me a new one and it arrived with the SAME broken part on it! I'm going to try it again for the last time, but I'm not feeling optimistic about our chances for one that isn't broken (or that won't break as soon as we use it).
customer_reviews.author: Pat

customer_reviews.title: Love this
customer_reviews.text: This is huge! But it definitely helped me empty all of the boxes from my snack cupboard.
customer_reviews.author: Danielle B.

customer_reviews.title: It's okay.
customer_reviews.text: It fit's everything and spins but I wish the top organizer were removable or adjustable for different sized items. Also if you put things that are too heavy in the bottom part the plastic it's sitting on will rub on the spinning part and make a lot of noise. The plastic is just too thin on the bottom to hold up anything more than a few bags of chips.
customer_reviews.author: ABeck

customer_reviews.title: Neat snack tray
customer_reviews.text: Okay so I've had this for 10 minutes, but I love it so far. I have 2 kids and lots of small granola bar type snacks fit on the top. I have it filled with healthier options now. I can see this downstairs in a theater room, or we plan on having the kids virtual homeschooling down there. Very convenient and neat.
customer_reviews.author: Dawn lang

customer_reviews.title: Practical, while it lasts.  Great idea, just poorly made.
customer_reviews.text: It worked well for about 6 months. Then it broke. Specifically the bottom part where the lazy suzan mechanism is located broke off from the bottom tray. Its held together with a tiny bit of plastic that the unit rotates around . Since all the weight of the unit (filled with snacks) rests on this tiny piece of plastic, one can see how it could break easily upon lifting the unit. They should really make that one part with a metal bolt and washers. It needs to be something more durable than plastic to withstand the movement of the lazy suzan and moving and lifting the tray.
customer_reviews.author: Michelle C

customer_reviews.title: Just what I needed for always hungry kids
customer_reviews.text: I love it. I stocked it with snacks for the kids and their friends so that they don't go hunting through the pantry and cabinets and it works like a charm. Gaggle of teenage girls come out of the girl cave starving- huddle around the handy dandy snack bar- grab what they want and head back to their cave. I also like that I can see what is running low and restock easily. It doesn't look bad on the counter either. It was very easy to assemble and functions exactly as one would hope. I could see this being handy and convenient for a very long time. I think it will make a great gift too.
customer_reviews.author: Dianna

customer_reviews.title: An inexpensive solution
customer_reviews.text: This is a nice and medium size snack organizer that we placed in our dedicated home theater. Easy to set up and both racks can be rotated for easy access. Grandkids love coming to the house to watch movies and eat their favorite snacks.
customer_reviews.author: junin07

customer_reviews.title: Great For Pantry
customer_reviews.text: I got this because my pantry has been an absolute s*** show since the kids have been home for the last 6 months. I put it on the shelf in the pantry and fill it up, then toss the boxes. Otherwise I would have 3 empty boxes, 6 boxes with only 1 or 2 snacks left in it and 14 snack bags of chips heaped on the shelf while the bag’s still in there with 2 bags of chips in left in it. Things get eaten instead of buried and forgotten until it’s old and stale.
customer_reviews.author: Tanya Delgado

customer_reviews.title: Arrived damaged; incorrect specs given
customer_reviews.text: The item arrived damaged (see photo), so the top rack doesn’t lock into place and falls off when you spin it. I was actually willing to use it anyway because I didn’t want to bother with returning it. But the measurements given on the product page are incorrect. The height of the overall rack is 16 inches, not 14 inches. I had measured my pantry shelves beforehand because they’re not adjustable, so I had to be sure this rack would fit. Unfortunately, it doesn’t, which would have been nice to have known before ordering it. Looks like I’ll be returning it after all.
customer_reviews.author: Larissa

customer_reviews.title: A little issue with assembly but it's working great
customer_reviews.text: Bought it used in original shipping box, supposedly only damage was to be to the shipping box but found out there was a broken piece to the bottom tier. That broken piece is vital for the attachment of the bottom turning rollers and as I was fixing it I realized how that piece broke and how easy it was for it to break during the attachment. So, unless this certain piece on was a bit defective, might be a common problem. Fortunately it is a very easy fix with some strong super glue and it has not affected its use. It's been working great and saved up some space.
customer_reviews.author: Armando Fernandez

customer_reviews.title: GREAT snack holder!
customer_reviews.text: Snacks and chips look so cool displayed in our Mind Reader Lazy Susan! No more digging in our pantry for snacks! I like the top of the Lazy Susan with the little sections. It makes snacks stack neatly and separates different snacks. The bottom holds many single serving size chip bags which gives us a choice of chips to choose from.
customer_reviews.author: Madonna

customer_reviews.title: Horrible, the second tier broke when barely loaded with ...
customer_reviews.text: Horrible, the second tier broke when barely loaded with snacks. Used one time for event before ultimately breaking. I threw it in the trash, big waste of money
customer_reviews.author: Jenifer Bound

customer_reviews.title: Great purchase!
customer_reviews.text: So the instructions aren’t good but it’s easy to figure out. Mine came broken but I was still able to put it together and make it work (honestly I have no idea what the broken parts purpose was for) it’s also much bigger in person then I expected so that was nice
customer_reviews.author: Barbie velazquez

customer_reviews.title: Great look & function.
customer_reviews.text: I loved the mind reader snack bar. It's so convenient & everyone in the office enjoys it as well!! Item did come in with a piece broken, it's still usable just a bit wobbly when it spins.
customer_reviews.author: Julz

customer_reviews.title: Worth the money
customer_reviews.text: Love this so much. Very easy ro put together, took maybe 2 min. tops . Holds quite a bit of snacks for my girls. Great buy!
customer_reviews.author: Vonne16

customer_reviews.title: Perfect
customer_reviews.text: Super easy to put together, bigger than expected but not exactly a bad thing. It will hold your snacks and makes it look organized. We put chips, hot coco packets and popcorn packets in it allowing us to get rid of the bulky boxes. It does spin 360 degrees smoothly
customer_reviews.author: Stephanie Berge

customer_reviews.title: Needs better shipping packaging.
customer_reviews.text: I received this product and the clips that hold the top section on were broken when I opened the box. Amazon was great and immediately sent a replacement. That one showed up as the replacement - the clips for BOTH the top and bottom section were broken, so that one was even more useless than the first. It seems like it would be a great product that spins well (when I place the parts together, it seems very smooth, but with the clips broken off, the top just falls off when bumped). Unfortunately I am just getting a refund this time around and will have to find something else for my storage needs.
customer_reviews.author: nedra honsinger

customer_reviews.title: Perfect way to organize pantry!
customer_reviews.text: I bought this to organize my pantry, all the different bars and snacks. It is perfect! It was simple to put together and I can't give it enough praise. I'm so glad I found it....Now I want one for the bathroom closet.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Excellent
customer_reviews.text: I order healthy snacks at work for the team. I set them out every work day, but the space is very small. So, I bought this carousel and it works perfectly. It smoothly rotates and holds a lot of large and small snacks. Very satisfied with this purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Stacey

customer_reviews.title: Exactly what I wanted...
customer_reviews.text: Exactly what I wanted for our theater room. That said, great a deal and price. Down side a piece was broken when I opened it but a little duck tape works wonders. No one will ever know but us.
customer_reviews.author: TR

customer_reviews.title: Meh...
customer_reviews.text: I bought two of these for work. these are great for standing still in one place. I had to move them several times. They both broke after using them for two days and now they suck. If you have kids, or have to move them from place to place... they aren't really durable or built for that. If you plan to gently use them. This is the product for you.
customer_reviews.author: fortunebaby03

customer_reviews.title: Worth every penny!!
customer_reviews.text: I love the different compartments on the upper tier!! You can nicely store a variety of smaller snacks there while storing larger bags at the bottom. I have been able to organize my snacks while keeping them easily accessible for the kids. I never over purchase anymore because what I do have is visible and organized!!! Very sturdy!!! Awesome product!!
customer_reviews.author: Alexis Reyes

customer_reviews.title: Its sorta ugly
customer_reviews.text: Should have got the White, the Black is dull & drab , tricky & rickety to put together. S/b no more than $18.00 leans to the side like the Tower of Piza... going in the trash.....its ugly
customer_reviews.author: kc

customer_reviews.title: Would buy again!
customer_reviews.text: I’m really enjoying this. It is big but it holds a lot. I can now easily see what we have and what we may need. Less waste when stuff gets lost and expires in the cabinet. Wish I had it sooner.
customer_reviews.author: SusieQ

customer_reviews.title: Works great
customer_reviews.text: This little baby cleared out so many of my cabinets that were storing snacks and put everything out where it can be seen so things would get used and not go to waste
customer_reviews.author: PJP

customer_reviews.title: 2nd time receiving damaged product.
customer_reviews.text: Unfortunately this is the second time I’m receiving this product and it is damaged. I am uploading a photo of one of the units and coincidentally the second one has the damage in the same exact place. Also the ball bearings on the turnstile fell out when I took out of the package on the first one. There was glue on the bottom of the top turn style that was not dried yet. It’s a great concept but can’t seem to get one that isn’t damaged.
customer_reviews.author: Kristie David

customer_reviews.title: Works for me
customer_reviews.text: I use this on the kitchen table and fill it up with snacks and no more empty boxes in the pantry. My kids grab the snacks they want instead of digging through boxes and just put what they want in their lunch boxes.
customer_reviews.author: Donna Dominguez

customer_reviews.title: Also was an easy set up
customer_reviews.text: This was a lot more spacious than I thought. I was able to fit 3 packs of granola bars, Annie's gummies, Annie's Graham bunnies, Snyder's 100 calorie packs, and still had room for more. Also was an easy set up
customer_reviews.author: JT

customer_reviews.title: Great product!
customer_reviews.text: We are loving this product. I place snacks the kids are allowed to get themselves in here. They’re organized and it fits perfectly in the cabinet out of view.
customer_reviews.author: PhDmommy

customer_reviews.title: Love this!
customer_reviews.text: So this thing in way bigger than the pic shows. I love it though. Holds a ton of snacks. Spins freely. Overall I love you. It will make a great addition to the theater
customer_reviews.author: Nick gilroy

customer_reviews.title: Great lazy susan to organize 1 million snacks
customer_reviews.text: Perfect for the counter top snacks in the kitchen that we're getting out of control. It says it's for a break room, but if you have the space it holds A LOT. It could fit in a pantry if your shelves are deep and tall enough. It also might be cool for a craft desk area for art supplies.
customer_reviews.author: cbg

customer_reviews.title: Arrived broken and missing pieces
customer_reviews.text: I wish I had read the one-star reviews before ordering this. The organizer I received was not only broken (where the support column is supposed to connect to the bottom tier) but it was also missing a piece of the support column. Sections of the organizer were also mysteriously greasy. From reading the other reviews, I suspect I was sent someone's defective return. Avoid buying at all costs.
customer_reviews.author: Joyce Silvia

customer_reviews.title: Good
customer_reviews.text: This works good. Makes getting snacks easy for my granddaughter. I think it is a little overpriced for what it is and time will tell if it holds up.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Spacious and convenient
customer_reviews.text: Love how this has helped my pantry seem more spacious. My child doesn’t have to ask what there is to snack on because it’s all in one spot for him to spin and pick. But inevitably he still says there’s nothing to eat 🙄
customer_reviews.author: LAURA MOHOI

customer_reviews.title: Awesome product
customer_reviews.text: It was rhe exact size i needed so i could see everything that was there. Wonderful product and i would order again if i ever need another one.
customer_reviews.author: carla

customer_reviews.title: Poor quality plastic
customer_reviews.text: I ordered one of these to store some food items nicely in the pantry. I received it and it was broken. Returned it for an exchange. The second one I got was broken in the same place! Returned again and not trying again. Will buy something that is more dependable.
customer_reviews.author: Carla M

customer_reviews.title: It is great idea, if you get an undamaged one.
customer_reviews.text: The product seems like a great idea, however, like so many others that reviewed it, mine was received broken. Clearly it was defective when it was sent to me as the box was intact and the parts that were damaged/broken off, were not in the package.
customer_reviews.author: Michele Baker

customer_reviews.title: Horrible
customer_reviews.text: This came dented, it did not sit up straight was slanted. The middle piece that holds it didn’t even fit. Not good at all.
customer_reviews.author: samantha schaefer

customer_reviews.title: Great Multipurpose Organizer
customer_reviews.text: Great way to organize items such as snacks, small packets of mixes such as gravy, seasonings , tuna. Great for organizing flash cards for Pre -K or early elementary kids.
customer_reviews.author: Barb

customer_reviews.title: Arrived Broken
customer_reviews.text: Arrived broken, disappointed, but will use Gorilla glue to try to fix. Don't want to go through the hassle of returning.
customer_reviews.author: StyleladyD

customer_reviews.title: Great size - hopefully it will hold up
customer_reviews.text: This is a great lazy susan. Different size compartments for different snacks is a plus. Easy to put together. My only concern is how long it will last. When it is completely filled, it is a bit wobbly.
customer_reviews.author: Shopper1972

customer_reviews.title: check for damage first, but good quality.
customer_reviews.text: would be more stars but it came damaged so I can't connect the tiers. Otherwise its a sturdy cute snack holder. But mine is broke.
customer_reviews.author: K Quinn

customer_reviews.title: Broken
customer_reviews.text: I ordered this product and it came in broken, so I ordered a replacement and that one came in more broken than the first.
customer_reviews.author: geniphre

customer_reviews.title: Excellent!
customer_reviews.text: I bought this to use in my pantry to hold all those miscellaneous snacks like chips and bars. This has worked so well at keeping my pantry organized!
customer_reviews.author: Michelle Harris

customer_reviews.title: broken in box
customer_reviews.text: I received this item broken! The clips to the top tray were broken in the box. I was given another one at no cost...Great customer service however the second one is broken as well in the same place so now I have two broken trays.
customer_reviews.author: Heather

customer_reviews.title: Nice snack spinner
customer_reviews.text: Bought this to put in our little breakroom area. Everyone loves it. It was easy to assemble. My only concern is, because of the material, is if it falls from the counter I'm afraid it will break easy.
customer_reviews.author: Chelo1125

customer_reviews.title: Love it! Bigger than anticipated
customer_reviews.text: Super easy to assemble and bigger than I expected. Love the product and keeps organization simple and perfect with snacks. Highly recommended.
customer_reviews.author: Bree Chumbley

customer_reviews.title: Love the Snack organizer.
customer_reviews.text: Takes the clutter of boxes, and individual chip bag's laying all over the counter, away. I love how nice it looks with it full of snack's. I would have given it a 5 star if the clip on the bottom that hold's the lazy susan on was not broken off :( , when I unpackaged it from the box. Otherwise it is a great product.
customer_reviews.author: MOORE

customer_reviews.title: Should have bought this a long time ago!
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for my house to display snacks so my 6 y/o could pick out her snacks for school easier. They all used to be in a big bin and she would have to shuffle through them. My daughter enjoys it although I think my husband enjoys it more lol. A part of me wishes the bottom tray had built in slots for small chip bags but it’s still the best thing I got so far for snacks.
customer_reviews.author: Cherise

customer_reviews.title: YearsGreat novelty for a media room
customer_reviews.text: I came broke but was still able to assemble and make it work. Looks good in my media room.
customer_reviews.author: S Green

customer_reviews.title: Nice Organization for the Office
customer_reviews.text: Nice way to organize the coffee supplies and snacks at the office. Are durable and easy to put together.
customer_reviews.author: KAL1413

customer_reviews.title: Item arrived broken!
customer_reviews.text: The part that locks in the top piece came broken out of the box. It doesn't snap together without this
customer_reviews.author: Brandon

customer_reviews.title: Excellent lazy susan for kids snacks
customer_reviews.text: Love this product. It works really well for keeping the kids snacks organized and out in the open for them to chose from for school lunches and after school snacks.
customer_reviews.author: donnap

customer_reviews.title: Broken
customer_reviews.text: The product arrived broken so I ordered a replacement and it ALSO came with broken pieces.
customer_reviews.author: Katelynn

customer_reviews.title: Buy it
customer_reviews.text: I wish I had this years ago. It’s super easy to accede things fit nicely in all the cubicles.
customer_reviews.author: Andy Perez

customer_reviews.title: Employee breakroom favorite!
customer_reviews.text: Sturdy, rotates effortlessly. Large, fits a lot of chips, juices etc!
customer_reviews.author: clawwdis

customer_reviews.title: Big
customer_reviews.text: Read a few reviews before purchasing and I agree it works well and it s very useful.
customer_reviews.author: Stacey H.

customer_reviews.title: Holds a good amount of items
customer_reviews.text: Prong to connect top layer to bottom was broken on arrival.
customer_reviews.author: lopezgirl

customer_reviews.title: Easy to put together
customer_reviews.text: And perfect for a concession stand. Using for chips and candy
customer_reviews.author: Jewells28

customer_reviews.title: Well that didn't last
customer_reviews.text: When setting the lazy susan organizer up the plastic that attaches the column to the top snapped and couldn't be fixed. So bummed because I didn't even get to use it. Wish it was more sturdy!
customer_reviews.author: Histoown

customer_reviews.title: Great value!
customer_reviews.text: Have had this for a little over a year now. Purchased as an "after school snack tower." Has held up beautifully despite a 5 year old spinning it almost constantly when he looks for something! Used by me, my husband, a preteen, and preschooler! Great addition for our organization!
customer_reviews.author: Deidre Cunningham

customer_reviews.title: Broken
customer_reviews.text: Broken when received. A lot bigger than expected as well. Very sad it didn’t work out.
customer_reviews.author: Jennifer

customer_reviews.title: Delivered with piece broken and top heavy
customer_reviews.text: Shipped to me in product box and plastic broken but still goes together so we didn't return
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great for small office space.
customer_reviews.text: Nice and sleek way to store our snacks in the office. Definitely an upgrade from baskets or boxes. Great addition to the office.
customer_reviews.author: MsTiffanyChanel

customer_reviews.title: Love it
customer_reviews.text: Perfect for my home theater. Dont take much space but gives you a lot of snacks
customer_reviews.author: Derrick Allen

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Easy to put together. Works great. Use it in the break room at work. Coworkers love it.
customer_reviews.author: Michelle Mooney

customer_reviews.title: Arrived broken
customer_reviews.text: Recieved broken, the clips that attached the top spinning part are completely broken off.
customer_reviews.author: Brittany b

customer_reviews.title: Great product
customer_reviews.text: Great for the kids to sort out their snacks and organized. Good product easy to assemble
customer_reviews.author: Seth

customer_reviews.title: Great snack storage
customer_reviews.text: The first one i ordered had a broken piece as mentioned in the negative reviews, but Amazon sent a replacement the very next day that was perfect. I immediately put it together and stashed all my snacks in it. It accommodates a lot.
customer_reviews.author: Femi Steve

customer_reviews.title: Was broken out of the box - peg and surrounding area is a bit weak plastic
customer_reviews.text: Overall, the design was nice and how much you could fit in each section, but it was broken out of the box and had to be returned.
customer_reviews.author: Patty W.

customer_reviews.title: Awesome storage
customer_reviews.text: Love it. It sits a lot of stuff in there.
customer_reviews.author: Geraldine Stiles

customer_reviews.title: Trustworthy and reliable seller. A plus. Fast shipping thank you
customer_reviews.text: Exactly as described, easy Assemble, very convenient for snacks and treats for guests of an Airbnb
customer_reviews.author: Shelby Adair

customer_reviews.title: Great for kids and guests
customer_reviews.text: This is great for snacks and great for our guests to use. I related it 4 stars as mine can to be with a crack in it. It did effect the over all product. Just wish in shipping it was not damaged.
customer_reviews.author: ReRe Fokis

customer_reviews.title: Broken x2, would not recommend 👎
customer_reviews.text: 1st order arrived broken...made a return with a replacement to be sent. Replacement also arrived broken. I would not recommend. 🙁 Could of been a cool product.
customer_reviews.author: Jillian Marie

customer_reviews.title: Broken
customer_reviews.text: The round piece that go into the bottom tier that connects the top tier to bottom tier was in pieces. I returned it and was so excited to get the new replacement and the exact piece was again broken. I tried to use it anyway, but when you put it on the top of the column piece, it’s top heavy and falls off.
customer_reviews.author: Melissa Kowis

customer_reviews.title: came broken
customer_reviews.text: I ordered this product to place in my movie room and put snacks in. One of the main pieces came broken, and was unable to glue it back on because the piece that was broken was in half. Ordered again, and the same piece still came broken. This time, the broken piece was complete so I was able to glue it on.
customer_reviews.author: isabelle

customer_reviews.title: Product arrived broken
customer_reviews.text: ***Update *** Return and asked for a replacement (picture is of the second try) ... broken again!!! The tabs that hold on the race and ball bearing was broken in pieces.
customer_reviews.author: Allison McFarland Holzshu

customer_reviews.title: WORKS WELL
customer_reviews.text: I bought it to organize snacks and it works well. Just a little too big for the countertop. Good product.
customer_reviews.author: Deborah Sue Burns

customer_reviews.title: Snack Carousel
customer_reviews.text: Got my carousel in today and it was broken. Box fine... but many pieces broken. I was told I can get it replaced but not until end of month. Just want a refund please
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Cheap arrived broken twice
customer_reviews.text: Do not buy this.The first one I received there was a plastic piece broken so I was unable to assemble.They tried to make it right and sent me another one.Same piece broken on this one.Plastic is thin and cheap.I would not waste your money on this.
customer_reviews.author: Kristen Gauger

customer_reviews.title: Great product
customer_reviews.text: Took me less than a minute to assemble without directions it’s very easy. Also, bigger than I expected which is great. Very good quality
customer_reviews.author: Irene V.

customer_reviews.title: Great for a busy family
customer_reviews.text: I love that my kids have everything easy to access for packing their own lunches or after school snacks. And I can see when we are running low.
customer_reviews.author: Amy Sawyer

customer_reviews.title: Broken piece
customer_reviews.text: Came with a broken piece no point of returning anymore just keeping it.
customer_reviews.author: Maryjane Allison

customer_reviews.title: Love this Lazy Susan!!!
customer_reviews.text: LOVE THIS!!! Purchased these for work as we have a lot of meetings and trainings. Best purchase ever! Easy to put together and holds a wide variety of snacks that we don’t constantly have to refill.
customer_reviews.author: Robyn

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Enough space for all of our snacks and helps keep everything organized.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great buy holds chips and candy
customer_reviews.text: Would probably break if it fell, but it wor for exactly what it's made for.
customer_reviews.author: GandR

customer_reviews.title: If it wasn't already vroke it woulda been great
customer_reviews.text: Arrived broken. Now I gotta go out my way yo return it😒
customer_reviews.author: ayesha mckenzie

customer_reviews.title: Arrived damaged with broken assembly pieces
customer_reviews.text: The product arrived with broken pieces so the bottom part doesn't spin and the top piece is just resting on top. I needed it right away so didn't bother to return it. Just wish it wasn't damaged when I received it.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: CAME BROKEN IN BOX!
customer_reviews.text: Was very unhappy when I received this product and the main piece to connect it all together was broken. The clip that links the top half to the bottom half was chipped right off and was laying in the box. Seems like it was poorly crafted and put together. I wish it was a better quality or at least not broken.
customer_reviews.author: Meghan

customer_reviews.title: Good size
customer_reviews.text: Way bigger than I expected but it holds a lot
customer_reviews.author: Christine Smith

customer_reviews.title: I love how spins all the way around
customer_reviews.text: This product was a lifesaver. We were trying to find something besides putting them in pans or boxes to display and you never could see all the candy bars or chips, etc. but with this you can see everything.
customer_reviews.author: Kim

customer_reviews.title: Great snack organizer
customer_reviews.text: Easy to put together! Loaded it immediately with our snacks and fits perfectly on the counter or in my pantry!
customer_reviews.author: Dj

customer_reviews.title: Awesome carousel for the kitchen cupboard to store snacks
customer_reviews.text: Awesome carousel for the kitchen cupboard to store snacks. Kids have a variety to choose from at the turn of a wheel.
customer_reviews.author: Chris Helms

customer_reviews.title: Wish it was delivered without broken pieces :(
customer_reviews.text: I’m a little disappointed. A few pieces are broken and there is a crack as well. The base is off or something as well. It’s like this box was thrown on the ground a few times. Other than that it’s exactly what I wanted.
customer_reviews.author: Vana Vana

customer_reviews.title: I love love love this it is perfect for those stacks ...
customer_reviews.text: I love love love this it is perfect for those stacks of mom snacks you need to grab on the way out of the house!!! Fits perfectly underneath my counter!
customer_reviews.author: Marisa

customer_reviews.title: Great product!
customer_reviews.text: Great for the counter near my cash register. Love that the top and bottom both spin!
customer_reviews.author: Lisa Lattarulo

customer_reviews.title: Good buy
customer_reviews.text: A little expensive however, overall good quality and was bigger than expected which was great! Keeps snacks organized while looking good in your kitchen.
customer_reviews.author: JP

customer_reviews.title: Really perfect for snacks
customer_reviews.text: Love it got all my snacks in it so happy
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Love it!
customer_reviews.text: Love organizing our snacks in this. With 2 kids in elementary school, this is awesome.
customer_reviews.author: amandauga1

customer_reviews.title: Works well
customer_reviews.text: It arrived broken unfortunately. But I didn’t want to hassle returning it. It still works even with the broken part so it is durable!

product_meta.title: Mind Reader Supreme Snack organizer, 14 x 14.5 Round, Black
product_meta.description: Color:BlackMind Reader provides space-saving storage, dispensers, food carousels, lazy susans and unique home solutions to make organizing your life easy. Whether you are a small or large company, work at home or just want to get more organized, these organizing caddies and racks work for most work spaces. They are perfect for small living spaces including mobile homes, tiny homes, small apartments, dorms, vacation homes and more. Mind Reader storage caddies allow you to stack almost anything - disposable coffee and tea cups, lids, utensils, single serve coffee pods, Keurig cups, creamers, tea bags, stirrers, salt & pepper packets, vitamin packets, emergen-C packets, snack bags, chocolates, hot cocoa packets, ketchup and mustard packets that need to be near coffee pots, appliances, hot water dispensers and snack machines and inside breakrooms or waiting areas. Don't limit yourself - use organizing caddies to organize your desk space, break-room, kitchen counter at home, kitchen or office cabinets, dorm rooms and more. You can never have enough storage and organizing solutions for office, hospitality or home use. Space-saving is key to being organized when you have a small space to work with - consider table-top organizers and get creative with storage solutions. Storage caddies and small storage racks are constructed in neutral colors to coordinate or compliment any existing decor. Mind Reader storage, organizing, racks and units are a must-have for any home or office space. Unique Mind Reader home office, entryway, foyer, kitchen, bedroom organizing and storage solutions strive to make your life free from clutter and mess. Use wall hanging and counter top solutions by Mind Reader to reduce mess from your shelves, cabinets, kitchen table and more. Mind Reader offers space saving solutions for the home office including monitor risers, office space storage, dorm and study space organizers and school and art supply storage. Great space saving and organizing solution for teachers in classrooms, at summer camp - there is no limit to the organizing you can achieve with Mind Reader space saving, organizing solutions. Be creative with storage solutions by Mind Reader at home, in the office or anywhere you need to stay organized and clutter free. Storage and organizing solutions are versatile and unisex for men or woman and can be used for kids and adults where indicated. Small parts should always be kept out of reach of small children. Organizers that hang on the wall keep small hands from touching small objects and give you peace of mind that clutter and small items are out of reach. Mind Reader storage and organizing solutions are designed to help you bring calm and remove clutter - simple solutions for the home or office - adults of all ages can benefit from less clutter and more organization in their lives. Search for Mind Reader home and office organizing and space saving solutions on . Have friend who is moving into a new home - consider giving them an assortment of Mind Reader storage and space saving solutions for thier new home - they will certainly appreciate them.
feature_bullets: SNACK PROTEIN BAR CHIPS CAROUSEL 360 DEGREE RACK: Organize snacks so they are easy for people and kids to see - easy to grab your favorite snack and go at home, at the office and at hospitality areas - spin carousel to see the full assortment of snacks and then pick your favorite.

STURDY LARGE CAPACITY SPINNING CADDY : Sturdy steady base cannot easily be tipped over - spin with confidence - holds protein bars, granola bars, snack bars and small snack bags for a wide assortment of snacks to choose from - perfect for home use, breakroom at work, waiting room areas and more - 12 slots on top and one large open slot on the bottom.

PERFECT FOR AT HOME, OFFICE, RESTAURANT OR HOSPITALITY: Makes coffee, beverage and snack service areas easy to organize and refill as needed - place near on the counter where people gather for drinks and snacks - easy to display snacks with ease - take your hospitality area to the next level with this carousel.

SNACK ORGANIZER SPACESAVER FOR CONVENIENCE: Make it easy for your kids, staff and patrons to access snacks throughout the day - organize snacks on this kid-friendly packaged food storage carousel - rubber grips on the bottom keep lazy susan in place as you spin to find your favorite snack.
SPECIFICATIONS: Color: Black | Material: Plastic | DIMENSIONS (inches): Snack Rack 14 x 14. 5 Round | 12 Slots on top & large open bottom for convenience.

LIGHTWEIGHT AND DURABLE PLASTIC CONSTRUCTION: Food safe plastic is easy to place in the perfect spot on work counter, kitchen counter, table top or desk - can withstand day to day use of office employees, warehouse staff, hotel patrons and more.

EASY CARRY AND NON SLIP BASE: It's easy to move this light weight carousel organizer caddy so that it's close to coffee pots, hot water cooler or anywhere you need this organizer to sit - use near traditional condiment organizers to further organize office beverage area.

PERFECT FOR DORMS AND COLLEGE: Students and teachers need organizers too - use in dorm rooms, common areas where snacks, coffee, tea, hot chocolate - parents can send snack packs as gifts and you can fill them up to make sure you have a place to get that snack pick me up each day.

PERFECT FOR INDOOR OR OUTDOOR USE: Plastic construction can be used inside or outside for parties, BBQ, kid's or adult parties to help organize cups and lids on the beverage table, kitchen countertop, office table and more.
EASY TO CLEAN: Keeping organizers clean is easy - simply wipe clean with warm water and soap as needed to reduce dirt and germs.
